text:
Hello!
I have created and app via developers portal, verified domain, created webhook, specified all needed permissions in the app settings for contacts read, added webhook event for sending notification about new contact create event, activated the event and got status 200 with test button in the event settings but when I'm creating a new contact via website, I don't receive a webhook. Could you please help me to resolve the issue, please?
This <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/creating-an-app#install-an-app|app should be installed >as a "Connected App" on the Portal for which you want to receive the Contact.created webhook.
Thanks a lot. So it will be enough just to exchange the code to access/refresh tokens even if I wouldn't use them?
that is correct, you donâ€™t need to use them
